description:
A cross-plattform desktop app to watch anime and manage your personal watchlists


Patches:
New UI: Top Bar, Home, Browse, Settings
Updating through winget
Winget can take up to 1 day to accept the newest version and therefore updating it through winget can be a bit delayed.
Included Pull-Requests
- v1.1.0 - Design overhaul by @DubskySteam in #10
- HOTFIX v1.1.1 - #11
